title: Detection and analysis of deteriorated areas in solar PV modules using unsupervised sensing algorithms and 3D augmented reality
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Adel Oulefki, Yassine Himeur, Thaweesak Trongtirakul, Kahina Amara, Sos Agaian, Samir Benbelkacem, Mohamed Amine Guerroudji, Mohamed Zemmouri, Sahla Ferhat, Nadia Zenati, Shadi Atalla, Wathiq Mansoor
